title: Serif Church Sign Lettering
content:
This is some lettering for a church sign. It was installed many years ago, and over time, they lost some of the letters. They replaced them with a different font, but decided they wanted to revert back to this one. However, nobody knows what font it is.  
I’m having trouble finding a font that matches the “R” and the numbers.

Any help would be greatly appreciated!

In the second picture, it's the serif font, not the sans serif numbers on the right.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Church Sign](http://web.archive.org/web/20140724113826/http:/typophile.com/files/church%20sign%20-%20Copy.JPG) | 36.85 KB |
| [church sign.JPG](http://web.archive.org/web/20140724113826/http:/typophile.com/files/church%20sign.JPG) | 333.58 KB |
author: Jr_font

comments.content:
The letters are very small on your samples and can't be sure but it looks like **[Americana (Extra Bold Condensed)](http://web.archive.org/web/20140724113826/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Bitstream&ffam=Americana%20XBdCn%20BT%20-%20Extra%20Bold&fid=7b4597e75f92d555fbf1fa886cb4b85e&fsize=32&text=SUNDAY%20EVENING%20WORSHIP%206%3A00%20PM%207%3A00&wrap=2)** from Bitstream  
or a manually compressed Americana (Extra Bold) from Adobe, Linotype, URW++
